tool_description: Convert text to meaningful emojis using AI
name: Text to Emoji convert
title: Text to Emoji convert

api_list.name: your text prompt
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-emoji-convert.p.rapidapi.com/emoji/smiling face"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-emoji-convert.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-emoji-convert.p.rapidapi.com/emoji/{text}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-emoji-convert.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
